recipe.title: How to Make Mango Sorbet
recipe.intro: Mango sorbet is a refreshing frozen dessert, perfect for the tropical heat in Cairns. It is dairy-free and very easy to make!
recipe.ingredients: ripe mangoes, sugar, water, lime juice, a pinch of salt
steps: **Peel** the mangoes and **cut** the flesh into chunks.
**Make** a simple syrup by **heating** sugar and water in a pot until the sugar dissolves.
**Blend** the mango chunks, simple syrup, lime juice, and salt until very smooth.
**Pour** the mixture through a sieve to remove any lumps.
**Transfer** the mixture to a container and **freeze** for at least four hours.
**Stir** the sorbet with a fork every hour to keep it smooth. **Serve** in chilled bowls!

quiz1.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"Freeze for at least four hours."

review.text: On a hot day in Port Douglas, this is the place to go! I tried the mango sorbet and it was absolutely divine. The mango flavour was so fresh and natural. You can tell they use real local mangoes. It was smooth and light. Not too sweet at all. My partner had the passionfruit sorbet and she loved it too. They also have a mango and coconut option which I want to try next time. Sitting under the palm trees with a cold sorbet was the perfect afternoon!

quiz2.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"My partner had the passionfruit sorbet."

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Hi! It is such a hot day today, isn't it?

lines.speaker: Grace
lines.text: Yes, it is! Do you have anything cold and refreshing?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: We have homemade mango sorbet. It is perfect for a day like this.

lines.speaker: Grace
lines.text: Is it made with real mangoes?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Yes! We use fresh local mangoes from Bowen.

lines.speaker: Grace
lines.text: That sounds amazing. Is it dairy-free?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Yes, it is completely dairy-free. Just mango, sugar, and lime.

lines.speaker: Grace
lines.text: Lovely! Can I have a double scoop, please?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Of course! In a cup or a cone?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Here you go! That is seven dollars. Enjoy!

part_a.full_text: Excuse me, how much are the mangoes? They are three dollars a kilo. Are they from Bowen? Yes, they are Bowen mangoes. They are very sweet. Can I try one? Of course, here you go. Oh, this is delicious! I will take two kilos, please. No worries. Would you like a bag? Yes, please. Thank you!

part_b.full_text: Hello and welcome to Lagoon CafÃ©! We are excited to share our new summer menu. This month, we have four special frozen desserts. First, our famous mango sorbet made with Bowen mangoes. Second, a tropical coconut ice cream. Third, a passionfruit and lime frozen yoghurt. And fourth, a watermelon granita. All frozen desserts are six dollars for a single scoop and nine dollars for a double. We are open every day from eight in the morning until nine at night. Come and cool down with us!

try_it.example: Today was very hot in Cairns. A customer asked for something cold and refreshing. I recommended our mango sorbet and she loved it!
